Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.view

Class MapPanel

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.view.MapPanel
public class MapPanel
extends java.lang.Object
Map Panel class creating a raw map out of hexagon tiles. Map is prepared for changes within the MapCreator window. Each tile is connected by an event for filling it with different terrain or setting an enemy or chest object on this tile.
